name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Dorothy FINLEY, Appellee
docket_number: Commonwealth’s Appeal No. 14 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1985

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Dorothy FINLEY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Eric B. Henson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Gaele M. Barthold, Chief/Prosecution Appeals, Ann C. Lebowitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
507 A.2d 822
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Dorothy FINLEY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1985.
Decided April 23, 1986.
Eric B. Henson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Gaele M. Barthold, Chief/Prosecution Appeals, Ann C. Lebowitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
Catherine Harper, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
